com.metreeca.rest

Class Failure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.rest.Failure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<Response,Response>

    public final class Failure
extends Object
implements Function<Response,Response>
    HTTP processing failure.

    Reports an error condition in an HTTP request processing operation; can be transferred to the JSON body of an HTTP response like:

    
 <status>
 Content-Type: application/json

 {
     "error": "<error>",  # optional machine readable error tag
     "notes": "<notes>",  # optional human readable error notes
     "trace": <trace>     # optional structured JSON error trace
 }

      • internal

        public static Failure internal(Throwable cause)
        Creates a failure for an internal server error.
        Parameters:
        cause - the internal server error
        Returns:
        a new failure reporting cause with a status code; no detail about cause is disclosed to the client
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if cause is null

        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if status is less than 100 or greater than 599
